import React from 'react' import { TasksContext } from '../context' import checkIcon from '../assets/check-circle.png' import greenCheckIcon from '../assets/check-circle-green.png' import trashIcon from '../assets/trash-red.png' import editIcon from '../assets/edit-green.png' const Task = ({data}) => { const [ editTask, checkTask, removeTask] = useContext(TasksContext) return (
checkTask(data.id)} /> {data.title}
editTask(data.id)} /> removeTask(data.id)} />

{data.desc}

) } export default Task
